comment._content: New York City Mayor William Jay Gaynor died on September 10, 1913.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content:
whyaduck:

Thanks for the tip! We'll update the source data to reflect Gaynor's full name and a more accurate date.  The negative indicates the date of this photograph was March 20, 1913.
